code: import React,{useState}from'react';import HomePage from'./components/HomePage';import DailyReading from'./components/DailyReading';import MonthlyReading from'./components/MonthlyReading';import AllCards from'./components/AllCards';import BlogPost from'./components/BlogPost';import'./index.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[currentPage,setCurrentPage]=useState('home');const handleNavigate=page=>{setCurrentPage(page);};const handleBack=()=>{setCurrentPage('home');};const renderCurrentPage=()=>{switch(currentPage){case'daily':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DailyReading,{onBack:handleBack});case'monthly':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MonthlyReading,{onBack:handleBack});case'all-cards':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AllCards,{onBack:handleBack});case'blog':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BlogPost,{onBack:handleBack});default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HomePage,{onNavigate:handleNavigate});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"App",children:renderCurrentPage()});}export default App;
